identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

theme_strategy.rationale: Property management involves contracts, invoices, and data tables. A 'Paper/Physical' aesthetic (Light Mode) builds trust and readability. Dark mode is available for power users.

headings.usage: Use for all H1-H4. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all body text, tables, and UI elements. Excellent legibility for numbers (SRD currency).

layout_system.container_padding: p-6 or p-8 for internal containers

dashboard.name: Bento Mode B (High Density)
dashboard.rules: Every pixel utilized. Use h-full on children. No jagged bottoms.

marketing.name: Tetris Mode A (Asymmetry)
marketing.rules: Never fill 100% perfectly. Leave breathing room.

rules: Use Shadcn for interactive logic (Forms, Select, Datepicker, Dialogs).
Use raw HTML/Tailwind for structural layout (Sections, Grids).
Customize Shadcn components to remove the 'Vercel default' look.
Cards: Use 'Tracing Beam' style for active states, 'Glassmorphism' for sticky headers.

specific_overrides.Button: Pill-shaped or sharp edges. No default rounded-md.
specific_overrides.Card: Flat background, 1px subtle border, no shadow by default. Hover: Lift + Shadow.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle grain overlay on the main background to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers: bg-white/70 backdrop-blur-xl backdrop-saturate-150 border-b border-white/20.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO full-screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in specific 'hero' areas only.

motion.transitions: transition: transform 0.2s ease, opacity 0.2s ease (NO transition: all)
motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down slightly (0.98) on click.

login_hero.usage: Full height split-screen on Login/Register page.

dashboard_placeholder_1.usage: Widget background or property card example.

happy_tenants.usage: Tenant management section empty state or promo.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use 'text-align: center' on the main App container.
DO NOT use generic AI emojis (ðŸ¤–, ðŸš€) as icons.
Use 'recharts' for data visualization (customized to match theme).
Language: Interface is English but designed to accommodate Dutch text expansion.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Rental Management SaaS. Focus on the 'Dashboard' and 'Tenants' pages first. Use the defined color palette strictly. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard. Ensure the 'Login' page uses the split-screen layout with the provided image. Use 'Outfit' for all headings and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for body text.
